title: Honey Garlic Salmon Recipe
directions: Season the surface of the salmon with salt, black pepper and cayenne pepper. Set aside.
Mix the honey, water, apple cider vinegar, lemon juice and a pinch of salt together. Stir to combine well.

Heat up a skillet with the olive oil. Pan-fry the salmon until half done. Add the garlic into the pan until slightly browned. Add the honey mixture and lemon wedges into the skillet, reduce the sauce until itâ€™s sticky. Finish it off by broiling the salmon in the oven for 1 minute or until the surface becomes slightly charred (optional step)
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar or lemon juice
